title: Handwritten/Script Similar to William Lucas and Bickley
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419113529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FabFit_940header_4691.jpg)

I am searching for the typeface of the word Fabulously in this header. It looks so familiar, but I don't have it in my collection, and would really appreciate any help.

Thanks in advance you awesome typophiles :)

Heather

Font: 

 Honey Script 

Solved By: 

 [tylor.reimer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419113529/http:/typophile.com/user/25880 "View user profile.")
author: Heather Lorsong

comments.content:
That's it! I knew I had seen it before.

Thanks!  
Heather
